text: Christopher Crosby "Chris" Farley (February 15, 1964 â€“ December 18, 1997) was an American comedian, movie, television, stage, and voice actor. He was known for his comedy work in Saturday Night Live. Farley was born on February 15, 1964 in Madison, Wisconsin. He studied at Marquette University. He never married. Farley died on December 18, 1997 in his Chicago apartment at 875 North Michigan Avenue in Chicago, Illinois from cocaine intoxication and morphine overdose or drug overdose, aged 33. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1884 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Comedians from Wisconsin Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Drug-related accidental deaths in the United States Category:Actors from Madison, Wisconsin
title: Chris Farley
